content.question: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals a log subscript b c"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mi>c</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="a"><semantics><mi>a</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are positive integers. Which of the following is an equivalent representation of <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="log subscript b open parentheses c to the power of a close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mfenced><msup><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></msup></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses log subscript b c close parentheses to the power of a"><semantics><msup><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mi>c</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi>a</mi></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="log subscript b open parentheses c to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by a close parentheses end exponent close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mfenced><msup><mi>c</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="a log subscript 10 b plus a log subscript 10 c"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mi>c</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="log subscript b open parentheses c to the power of a close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mfenced><msup><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></msup></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
